name: part_006
file: tmp_【#癒月ちょこ生誕祭2024】‐ GotCheat‐コラボ者多数！重大告知あり！3DBirthdayLIVE!!!【ホロライブ⧸癒月ちょこ】 [5rns6j2eHcQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'SHUT-OUT' by Yuzuki Choco and AZKi.
MC section after the song performance. Choco compliments AZKi's 'Shirayuki' outfit, which AZKi is wearing outside of her own solo live for the first time.

subtitles.original: 結ばず　目を逸らす
subtitles.english: Without tying, looking away

subtitles.original: Believe you 何度目の後悔に
subtitles.english: Believe you, how many times of regret

subtitles.original: Realize I feel the
subtitles.english: Realize I feel the

subtitles.original: もういいよ　期待すら馬鹿だ
subtitles.english: Enough already, even expecting is stupid

subtitles.original: 退路が　閉ざされるね　懐かしもない
subtitles.english: The way back is closed, no nostalgia

subtitles.original: Ah Ah 夢に見る
subtitles.english: Ah Ah, dreaming

subtitles.original: Ne Ne 狂いそうよ
subtitles.english: Hey hey, I'm going crazy

subtitles.original: 壮大に　美を描く筆
subtitles.english: A brush that grandly paints beauty

subtitles.original: 触れないで　冷たくないの？
subtitles.english: Don't touch, isn't it cold?

subtitles.original: Shut up, give me おこがましい
subtitles.english: Shut up, give me, it's presumptuous

subtitles.original: 相反する言葉に耳を塞ぐ
subtitles.english: Closing ears to conflicting words

subtitles.original: 冗談ばっか　聞きたくないわ
subtitles.english: Nothing but jokes, I don't want to hear it

subtitles.original: 愛想尽くして　Be sick of the world
subtitles.english: Run out of patience, be sick of the world

subtitles.original: 曖昧それで　ひとり流して
subtitles.english: Vague, then, letting it flow alone

subtitles.original: 情調の気配　自己犠牲も抜け
subtitles.english: Sign of sentiment, even self-sacrifice is gone

subtitles.original: 操作性の虚に笑うよ
subtitles.english: Laughing at the void of operability

subtitles.original: 自己陶酔しないで　Die out of life
subtitles.english: Don't be narcissistic, die out of life

subtitles.original: 幻想に揺り動かされる
subtitles.english: Being shaken by illusions

subtitles.original: 愛なんて逃げ口上して
subtitles.english: Using love as an excuse to escape

subtitles.original: 悦を飲み　規制するの
subtitles.english: Drinking pleasure, regulating

subtitles.original: Believe you 自己に酔った言葉で
subtitles.english: Believe you, with self-intoxicated words

subtitles.original: I hate you I hate you
subtitles.english: I hate you I hate you

subtitles.original: もういいわ　悦に溺れて
subtitles.english: Enough already, drowning in pleasure

subtitles.original: 自分がないなんて　腐ればいい
subtitles.english: Saying you have no self, you should just rot

subtitles.original: Ah Ah 呆れるよ
subtitles.english: Ah Ah, I'm appalled

subtitles.original: Ne Ne それでいいの？
subtitles.english: Hey hey, is that okay?

subtitles.original: 妥協で泳ぐ世界に
subtitles.english: In a world swimming in compromise

subtitles.original: 幸あれと　吐き捨てるの
subtitles.english: Wishing luck, I spit it out

subtitles.original: Shut up, give me 煩わしい
subtitles.english: Shut up, give me, it's annoying

subtitles.original: 押し付けられる価値観に酔う
subtitles.english: Intoxicated by forced values

subtitles.original: 正論ばっか　聞きたくないわ
subtitles.english: Nothing but moralizing, I don't want to hear it

subtitles.original: 夢語ってろよ　Be sick of the world
subtitles.english: Keep talking about dreams, be sick of the world

subtitles.original: 曖昧それで　卑俗な言葉で
subtitles.english: Vague, then, with vulgar words

subtitles.original: 良心の快楽　飲み干すの　No soul
subtitles.english: Drinking up the pleasure of conscience, no soul

subtitles.original: 完敗だ　虚に笑うよ
subtitles.english: Complete defeat, I laugh at the void

subtitles.original: 自己陶酔でいいね　Die out of life
subtitles.english: Self-intoxication is fine, die out of life

subtitles.original: 預けられた心の鍵
subtitles.english: The key to the heart entrusted

subtitles.original: 誰もがすぐ失くすの
subtitles.english: Everyone loses it soon

subtitles.original: 嫌いと虚勢を張り
subtitles.english: Pretending to hate, bluffing

subtitles.original: 笑み浮かべ　街を行くの
subtitles.english: With a smile, walking the city

subtitles.original: Shut up, give me おこがましい
subtitles.english: Shut up, give me, it's presumptuous

subtitles.original: 相反する言葉に耳を塞ぐ
subtitles.english: Closing ears to conflicting words

subtitles.english: Nothing but jokes, I don't want to hear it

subtitles.original: 愛想尽くして　Be sick of the world
subtitles.english: Run out of patience, be sick of the world

subtitles.english: Vague, then, letting it flow alone

subtitles.original: 情調の気配　自己犠牲も抜け
subtitles.english: Sign of sentiment, even self-sacrifice is gone

subtitles.original: 操作性の虚に笑うよ
subtitles.english: Laughing at the void of operability

subtitles.original: 自己陶酔しないで　Die out of life
subtitles.english: Don't be narcissistic, die out of life

subtitles.original: I wanna shut up　息苦しいわ
subtitles.english: I wanna shut up, it's suffocating

subtitles.original: 愛想尽くして　Be sick of the world
subtitles.english: Run out of patience, be sick of the world

subtitles.original: はーい！ということで！
subtitles.english: Haaay! So!

subtitles.original: あずあずおめでとうございます！
subtitles.english: Azu-azu, congratulations!

subtitles.original: おめでとうございます！
subtitles.english: Congratulations!

subtitles.original: あずあず今日はありがとう！
subtitles.english: Azu-azu, thank you for today!

subtitles.original: しかも、この衣装！おめでとうございますは白雪の方で！あずあず本当にありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: And this outfit! The congratulations are for 'Shirayuki'! Azu-azu, thank you so much!

subtitles.original: てか、衣装！
subtitles.english: I mean, the outfit!

subtitles.original: え、何何？ちょこのさ、お誕生日のためにさ、おめかししてくれたの？ちょっと！
subtitles.english: Eh, what what? For Choco's birthday, you dressed up for me? Hey!

subtitles.original: そうですね。ちょっと、みずしーさん以外では初めてお披露目しますね。
subtitles.english: That's right. It's the first time I've shown it outside of 'Mizushi' [my solo live].

subtitles.original: ちょっ、ちょっ、ちょっ！見て見て！え、カメラさん、足下からちょっと！
subtitles.english: Hey, hey, hey! Look, look! Eh, camera-san, starting from the feet!

subtitles.original: ちょっ、足下... 私が主役じゃないですよね？いや、いいんですか？この...
subtitles.english: Hey, the feet... I'm not the lead today, right? Is it really okay? This...

subtitles.original: ゆっくりゆっくり。
subtitles.english: Slowly, slowly.

subtitles.original: えー、でも、めちゃめちゃ、え、待って、これ、え、可愛い！
subtitles.english: Eh, but, it's so... eh, wait, this... eh, it's cute!

subtitles.original: すいませ... やめてください！本当に！今日誕生日なのに！すげー被ってる。
subtitles.english: I'm sorr... Please stop! Seriously! It's your birthday today! I'm totally upstaging you.

subtitles.original: ちょ、もう本当に！お呼びいただけたことでも嬉しいですのに。
subtitles.english: Hey, seriously! I'm happy enough just to be invited.

subtitles.original: 私のオリ曲歌って、一緒に踊ってくださって、もう、めっちゃ...
subtitles.english: Singing my original song and dancing together with me, it's just, so...

subtitles.original: いや、なんかもう、めっちゃかっこいい曲やし、セクシーやし、もう、ねえ！
subtitles.english: No, I mean, it's such a cool song, and sexy, right!

subtitles.original: いや、私もチョコ先生バージョンが聞きたかったし！
subtitles.english: No, I also wanted to hear the Choco-sensei version!
